intro: Nahuatlea arborescens, commonly known as the red-flowered tree, is a species of flowering plant native to Mexico. Its leaves are ovate and have a rough texture, while its bark is smooth and reddish in color. Nahuatlea arborescens is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, thriving in well-drained soils.
